attributes.action: SHOW SOME HUMILITY ABOUT YOUR EXPENSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop blaming a failure of a system which you helped create Brown. We are not the idiots you take us for. Stop treating us with contempt.

Admit you and your colleagues are thieving scoundrels who would rob a blind man of his stick and dog if you could make a quid or two.

Admit you believe the general public are nothing more than scum, there only to supply corrupt MPs with a ready supply of cash.

Do it NOW Brown NOW

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
